name: Zen Delay
details:
Dub Delay Effects UnitNinja Tune - an English independent record label based in London and Erica Synths have teamed up to create a custom dub delay effects unit, the Zen Delay.
Features
Controls
delay time, feedback, delay mod (5 presets), tap button, dry/wet, bypass switch, filter cutoff, resonance, drive,  input level, filter mode
Inputs 
Stereo In: 2x standard jack
MIDI In: standard MIDI socket 
CV In: standard jack
Outputs
Stereo Out: 2 x standard jack
Delay times
1-5000ms with 1/8...x8 of clock/tap rate in beat mode 
https://www.ericasynths.lv/shop/standalone-instruments-1/zen-delay/
